content: {"Name": "Van Schoonhoven Square", "Entity_Id": 3959, "Category": "Mobile Food Resources", "Subcategory": "Veggie Mobile Sprout\u00ae", "Organization": "Capital Roots", "More_Information": "We recommend calling to verify times and locations\r\nCall or email at least one day ahead to place your order.\r\nEmail: mobilemarket@capitalroots.org", "Counties": ["Saratoga"], "Location": "", "Address": "1 Van Schoonhoven Square", "City": "Waterford", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12188", "Phone": "518-274-8685", "Hours_of_Operation": "Thursdays 3:00pm-3:45pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "Cash, EBT/SNAP & FMNP, Double Up Food Bucks, Fresh Connect Checks, Cash, Credit, Debit", "Website": "https://www.capitalroots.org/veggie-mobile/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 1, "Latitude": "42.79541377422521", "Longitude": "-73.68053356716078", "Last_Updated": "06-11-2025", "icon": "marker-7E1000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
